name: Light Seeker
description:
Details:

This game was made for Untitled Game Jam #73

The themes were "Light" and "Loop"

The theme light was incorporated into this by making the point of the game is to chase the light to survive.

The theme loop was incorporated by making a looping day-night cycle.

Goal:

Survive as long as possible. Zombies will come out at night and try to kill you. You can collect resources and build to help in your survival.

Good Luck!

Controls:
  • [WASD]/[ARROWS] to move
  • [Click] to break, chop, place, and kill
  • [F11] to toggle fullscreen (executable only)
:D
